name: Dream Avatar (gresea)
description:
Welcome to the Magnus Institute, home to supernatural artifacts- and cute archival assistants and librarians?  Enter the Institute and flirt with the employees, maybe make a tea pun (or two)!

note:

This is just a (very) small demo inspired by "Tim Stoker looks like the dad from Dream Daddy" and me having too much time over winter break combined with quarantine! 

Depending on time I may or may not add more to this, as I am currently scripting, coding, and drawing out the sprites on my own (again, sorry if the demo is too short :,0)!
